description:
A compact, stylish dining solution for apartments, balconies, verandas, caf√©s, or event styling. This set pairs our Ezy rectangular folding table with Four ¬†European-designed Directors Chairs‚Äîbringing flexible seating for six, warm natural timber, and fold-flat storage to modern living.

Highlights

  • Space-saving & portable: Fold-down table legs and foldable chairs store flat in seconds‚Äîideal for small spaces or occasional entertaining.

  • Solid Acacia timber: Dense, durable hardwood with beautiful grain from honey-gold to deep brown; naturally resistant to moisture and decay.

  • Comfort you can carry: Directors Chair design offers supportive seating with organic wood textures and visible knots for a natural, relaxed look.

  • Water-resistant construction: Worry less around covered outdoor areas, by the pool, or after a light shower.

  • Versatile styling: Minimal table lines pair with many chair styles; use as a dining table, work desk, or an extra serving surface.

  • Ethically sourced craftsmanship: Quality timber and considered design, manufactured in Vietnam .

What‚Äôs included

  • 1 √ó Ezy Rectangular Folding Table

    • Material: Acacia (non-FSC)

    • Dimensions: 80 √ó 120 √ó 9 cm (folded thickness approx. 9 cm)

    • Weight: 17 kg

    • Assembly: Not required

    • Best use: Indoors or covered outdoor spaces (patio/balcony/veranda)

  • 4 √ó Directors Chairs

    • Material: Acacia

    • Dimensions (each): 55 √ó 52 √ó 85 cm

    • Weight (each): ~5 kg

    • Construction: Foldable, water-resistant; manufactured in Vietnam

    • Assembly: Required

Who it‚Äôs for

Urban households, Airbnb hosts, caf√©s, and anyone who wants a foldable outdoor/indoor dining set that‚Äôs easy to move, store, and style without sacrificing comfort.

Care & maintenance

Wipe spills promptly. Use placemats/coasters. Re-oil timber periodically to nourish Acacia and enhance its water repellence. Store under cover when not in use; avoid prolonged direct exposure to rain/sun.

Why Acacia?

Acacia (Wattle) is a dense, hard, durable hardwood prized for its striking grain and natural oils that help resist water and decay‚Äîmaking it a smart, beautiful choice for long-lasting furniture.

name: White Three Tier Bookshelf
description:
Introducing our newest addition to the Qtoys family: the White Three Tier Bookshelf‚Äîa compact and versatile storage solution designed specifically for toddlers and children. This thoughtfully crafted bookshelf is not only practical but also promotes independence and organization in young learners.

Key Features:

  • Child-Friendly Design: With its perfectly sized shelves and easy-to-reach height, our White Three Tier Bookshelf empowers children to independently access their toys and books, fostering a sense of autonomy and responsibility.
  • Efficient Organization: The unique three-tier design allows for effortless placement and retrieval of books, puzzles, and other items, making organization a breeze for both children and caregivers.
  • Space-Saving: Designed with small spaces in mind, this bookshelf is compact yet spacious, offering ample storage without taking up valuable floor space. Its slim profile makes it an ideal fit for nurseries, playrooms, and bedrooms alike.
  • Stylish and Functional: Combining functionality with aesthetics, the clean white finish adds a touch of modern elegance to any play space, enhancing its visual appeal while keeping belongings neatly organized.

Also, the shelves have a glossy finish, which adds a stylish and modern touch to your child’s play space. This also makes it easy to clean and maintain.

name: Outdoor cushion
description:
Elevate Your Outdoor Comfort with Versatile Outdoor Cushions

Enhance your outdoor seating experience with our premium Outdoor Cushions. Designed for both style and functionality, these canvas-colored cushions are the perfect addition to any outdoor setting. Whether you’re lounging on the patio, relaxing in the garden, or hosting a backyard barbecue, these cushions offer the perfect blend of comfort and durability.

Quality Craftsmanship for Lasting Comfort

Crafted from high-quality canvas, our Outdoor Cushions are built to withstand the elements while providing optimal comfort and support. The durable fabric resists fading, staining, and mildew, ensuring long-lasting performance even in outdoor environments. Plus, the removable cover makes cleaning and maintenance a breeze, allowing you to keep your cushions looking fresh and vibrant season after season.

Seamless Indoor-Outdoor Transition

Versatile and adaptable, our Outdoor Cushions seamlessly transition from outdoor to indoor spaces with ease. Whether you’re adding a pop of color to your outdoor lounge area or enhancing the comfort of your indoor seating arrangement, these cushions are the perfect choice. Their neutral canvas color complements a wide range of decor styles, making them a versatile and practical addition to any home.

Conclusion

In conclusion, our Outdoor Cushions offer the perfect combination of style, comfort, and durability for both indoor and outdoor use. With their quality craftsmanship, removable covers, and seamless indoor-outdoor transition, these cushions are sure to elevate your seating experience wherever you place them. Invest in our Outdoor Cushions today and enjoy the ultimate in comfort and style for your outdoor living spaces.
